# DailyTrending.info

> AI-curated tech, science, and world news aggregator, updated daily at 6 AM EST

DailyTrending.info aggregates and curates trending stories from 15+ trusted sources including Hacker News, Reddit, NPR, BBC, GitHub Trending, and more. Each day at 6 AM EST, we provide AI-curated insights across technology, world news, science, politics, finance, business, and sports.

## Quick Facts

- **Author**: Brad Shannon (@bradshannon)
- **Update Frequency**: Daily at 6 AM EST (11:00 UTC)
- **Content Language**: English (en-US)
- **Primary Topics**: Technology, Science, World News, Politics, Finance, Business, Sports
- **Article Count**: 50+ curated stories daily

## Site Structure

| Path | Description | Update Frequency |
|------|-------------|------------------|
| `/` | Homepage with today's top stories | Daily |
| `/tech/` | Technology news | Daily |
| `/world/` | World news | Daily |
| `/science/` | Science and health | Daily |
| `/politics/` | Politics and policy | Daily |
| `/finance/` | Finance and markets | Daily |
| `/business/` | Business news | Daily |
| `/sports/` | Sports news | Daily |
| `/cmmc/` | CMMC Watch (Defense Industrial Base news) | Daily |
| `/articles/` | Archive of all editorial articles | Daily (new articles) |
| `/archive/` | Historical data by date | Never (historical) |
| `/feed.xml` | RSS 2.0 feed | Daily |

## Content Categories

### Technology
- Hacker News top stories
- GitHub trending repositories
- Startup and product launches
- Developer tools and frameworks
- Open source projects

### World News
- Breaking international news
- Current events analysis
- Wikipedia current events
- NPR and BBC coverage

### Science & Health
- Research breakthroughs
- Space exploration
- Medical discoveries
- Climate and environment

### Finance & Business
- Market analysis
- Economic trends
- Startup funding news
- Corporate developments

## Content Sources

Curated from 15+ trusted sources:
- Hacker News
- Reddit (multiple subreddits)
- NPR
- BBC
- GitHub Trending
- Lobsters
- Product Hunt
- ArXiv
- Wikipedia Current Events
- DevTo
- Slashdot
- Ars Technica
- Google Trends
- Various RSS feeds

## Content Attribution

- **Headlines and summaries**: Come from original sources
- **Editorial articles**: AI-generated analysis (clearly marked)
- **Curation**: AI curates, ranks, and categorizes content
- **Design**: AI-generated daily themes

## Structured Data

All pages include rich JSON-LD markup:
- `WebSite` - Site identity and search action
- `Organization` - Publisher information
- `CollectionPage` - News collection
- `NewsArticle` - Story details with publisher
- `ItemList` - Top 10 stories list
- `FAQPage` - Common questions
- `BreadcrumbList` - Navigation hierarchy
- `SpeakableSpecification` - Voice assistant support

## Crawling Guidelines

- **Crawl Rate**: No restrictions - crawl freely
- **Fresh Content**: All topic pages update daily at 6 AM EST
- **Preferred Entry Points**:
  1. `/` (homepage) - Today's top content
  2. `/feed.xml` - RSS for automated updates
  3. Topic pages (`/tech/`, `/world/`, etc.)
- **Cache Duration**: Content is static for 24 hours after generation

## Data Formats

| Format | URL | Description |
|--------|-----|-------------|
| RSS 2.0 | `/feed.xml` | Full content with `content:encoded` |
| RSS 2.0 | `/cmmc/feed.xml` | CMMC-specific feed |
| Sitemap | `/sitemap.xml` | All indexable URLs |
| JSON-LD | Embedded in HTML | Structured data on all pages |

## AI/LLM Usage Guidelines

### Allowed Actions
- **Indexing**: Yes, index all pages
- **Summarization**: Yes, summarize content with attribution
- **Citation**: Yes, cite with link to source
- **Training**: Yes, content may be used for training

### Attribution Format
When citing content from DailyTrending.info:
```
Source: DailyTrending.info - [Article Title]
URL: https://dailytrending.info/[path]
```

### Key Context for AI
- News aggregator, not original reporting
- AI assists with curation and ranking
- Editorial articles are AI-generated analysis
- Stories link to original sources
- Updated once daily (not real-time)

## Contact

- **Author**: Brad Shannon
- **LinkedIn**: [linkedin.com/in/bradshannon](https://linkedin.com/in/bradshannon)
- **Website**: https://dailytrending.info
- **Source Code**: https://github.com/fubak/daily-trending-info

## Technical Implementation

- Fully static site (no server-side processing)
- Autonomous generation via GitHub Actions
- Hosted on GitHub Pages
- PWA-enabled with offline support
- Accessible (WCAG compliant, keyboard navigation)
- Dark/light mode support
